title: Connie's Pleasure
description: Book 2 - An Invitation From A Fairy SeriesSometimes it takes the magic of a fairy godmother and a wicked sexual fulfillment to find your destiny... And the love of a lifetime.One night to fulfill their innermost sexual fantasies. An exclusive gold-lettered invitation. A supernatural satisfaction. Can these women handle the heat?Many years ago, a fairy was tricked into our world and into a carnival by its evil owner. After he dies, she decides to turn the carnival into something completely different. Receiving a magical invitation, one lucky woman gets to experience a night of wicked delights that will change her life forever.Set in the 1950's Connie's Pleasure is the story of Connie, a married woman in New Orleans, whose husband has one foot out the door.Devastated by the tragic loss of her marriage, she's stunned when she receives an erotic invitation. Throwing caution to the wind, she accepts. It's a decision that will alter her life forever.This is an afternoon-read novella consisting of Book 2 in the series, An Invitation From A Fairy. Although this is a series, these books can be read in any order. Full of sugar, and a whole lot of spice, this naughty and decadent read was created for readers eighteen and up! Check out Book 1, Giselle's Pleasure!
author: Rose Wynters
